mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm_rule (application_id, service_type, checker_name, threshold, user_group_id, sms_send, email_send, notes) VALUES (#{applicationId}, #{serviceType}, #{checkerName}, #{threshold}, #{userGroupId}, #{smsSend}, #{emailSend}, #{notes})

INSERT INTO alarm_history (rule_id, application_id, checker_name, detected, sequence_count, timing_count) VALUES (#{ruleId}, #{applicationId}, #{checkerName}, #{detected}, #{sequenceCount}, #{timingCount})
